title: Home - actin eSports - Competetive Gaming seit 2015

embed.description: Willkommen bei actin eSports. "actin" ist ein deutsches eSport Projekt. Im Jahr 2015 ging actin in die Startlöcher, wobei das Projekt bereits 2014 in Planung war. Es wird nach dem Strukturprotein "Aktin" benannt, welches in Muskelzellen auftritt und die Stärke unserer Teams symbolisiert.

body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team will have Playtime Shedule ( nearly Daily).
-Playtime will be fixed with the complete Roster.
-We are a Multigaming Clan with sponsoring etc (link)
-We are looking to fill every Role atm.
-We will use TS3 for communication.
-be atleast 18years old (exceptions can be made)
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who  play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for. 
-I will play some Normals with all of my applicants.



if ur interrested pls apply here and/or addme ingame for a chat.

Strawhatya :)
